<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Returns the nearest EH pad that dominates this instruction. This does not use</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// dominator analysis; it just does BFS on its predecessors until arriving at an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// EH pad. This assumes valid EH scopes so the first EH pad it arrives in all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// possible search paths should be the same.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Returns nullptr in case it does not find any EH pad in the search, or finds</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// multiple different EH pads.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Hoist catch instructions to the beginning of their matching EH pad BBs in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// case,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (1) catch instruction is not the first instruction in EH pad.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ehpad:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   some&#95;other&#95;instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> WebAssembly::CATCHRET: &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Replace a catchret with a branch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a1441f79530bc7f3a89118bb8067eac69">TBB</a> = TI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad67c9230577a0b640c52852c75c93939">getOperand</a>(0).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a57e64b633278df75c699e6b98ce15031">getMBB</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">      TI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ac2421adbb9996e1b15f03a8abb6c70a8">eraseFromParent</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> WebAssembly::RETHROW:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// These RETHROWs here were lowered from llvm.wasm.rethrow() intrinsics,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// generated in Clang for when an exception is not caught by the given</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// type (e.g. catch (int)).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// RETHROW&#39;s BB argument is the EH pad where the exception to rethrow has</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// been caught. (Until this point, RETHROW has just a &#39;0&#39; as a placeholder</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// argument.) For these llvm.wasm.rethrow()s, we can safely assume the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// exception comes from the nearest dominating EH pad, because catch.start</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// EH pad is structured like this:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// catch.start:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   catchpad ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %matches = compare ehselector with typeid</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   br i1 %matches, label %catch, label %rethrow</span></CodeLine>
